attributes.action: Step down as the PM, we have NO confidence in him as a leader.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: since gordon brown has taken over all bills, taxes, fuel prices have went up dramatically, his job is to keep the basics for the people low, now we are looking at a job cuts, and hard working people cant afford to live in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
